Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: The Bright Point in your Bethlehem Experience is waiting to welcome you. This sparkling Courtyard promises gracious service, amazing sleep experiences, and unique hot breakfast offerings.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Feel welcome during your travels by staying at Courtyard Bethlehem Lehigh Valley/I-78, one of the most comfortable and cozy hotels in Bethlehem, PA. Our sparkling Courtyard by Marriott in Bethlehem promises gracious service, amazing sleep experiences and unique hot breakfast offerings that feature some of Pennsylvania's old country favorites. The lobby will become your family room away from home with a full service bar, warm fireplace, numerous TVs, and plenty of room to gather and connect with friends and family, either in person or via free wireless Internet. Our Bethlehem, PA, hotel also offers an on-site exercise room and an indoor pool for aquatic fun year-round. We are located within close proximity of many Lehigh Valley attractions such as Lehigh University, Lafayette College, Sands Casino Resort, and the Crayola and Martin Guitar factories. It's easy for our hotel in Bethlehem, PA, to stand out as a top choice because of our ideal location, friendly service and exceptional on-site amenities.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: The Courtyard Bethlehem is located just 1 mile off of Interstate I-78, between Route 33 and Route 22. Just minutes from downtown Bethlehem and downtown Easton, The Courtyard is conveniently located just 20 minutes from the Lehigh Valley Airport.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Our Lehigh Valley hotel's customer-focused design allows guests to be more comfortable and productive during their stay.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Try our healthy breakfast buffet or hot items cooked to order that are always freshly prepared and reasonably priced.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Our hotel's spacious guest rooms offer soft bedding, expanded work areas, and free high-speed Internet.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Our Easton hotel accommodations offer spacious rooms that combine comfort and functionality.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Work comfortably at the large desks and ergonomic chairs in each of our hotel rooms.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Get a good night's sleep in the plush bedding provided in our hotel's guest rooms.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: We are one of the most accommodating hotels near Easton and Bethlehem offering free wifi.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Our rooms have conveniently placed lighting and many outlets to help increase your productivity.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Each of our guest rooms is aesthetically pleasing and boasts modern décor.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Our Easton hotel accommodations offer spacious rooms that combine comfort and functionality.

Each of our guest rooms is aesthetically pleasing and boasts modern décor.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Ideal accommodations for out-of-town wedding guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Large conversation area with fireplace and The Point Lobby Bar.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Private meeting space available for group breakfasts.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Customized catering menu options available for breaks and lunch.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Meeting and event sales manager on site to handle all needs.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our location close to Blue Mountain Ski Area is ideal for guests looking to hit the slopes.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: We are only a few miles from Lafayette College and Lehigh University.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Sands Casino Resort Bethlehem is a popular attraction just 15 short minutes away from our hotel.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Dorney Park and Wild Water Kingdom

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Refreshing event menus just right for you!

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: We have comfortable and intimate meeting rooms in Bethlehem, PA, ideal for small group gatherings.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Access high-speed wired and wireless Internet in both of our meeting rooms.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Catering options at our hotel include continental breakfasts, lunch, and breaks.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Our meeting rooms are equipped with teleconferencing capabilities and projectors.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Business services at our hotel include copy and fax services, printing and post/parcel delivery.

RestaurantDescription.Text: The Essence of Bethlehem where handcrafted beers are brewed right in the restaurant

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A casual elegance, a relaxed, sophisticated, cool and classic ambience

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Casual, coastal and cozy - fresh seafood, fin fish, shellfish and hearty chowders in a warm, relaxing atmosphere that says "seaside" - a place that had tradition, patriotism, and a New England heritage about it.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy an undefeated dining experience at Shula's Steak House, where we only offer the best beef money can buy, The SHULA CUT ® .

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: From Lehigh Valley International Airport (ABE)-Turn right onto PA 987 S (Airport Rd.) Continue left onto US 22 E, exit right onto PA Rt. 33 S, exit right onto Freemansburg Ave., turn right onto Emrick Blvd.

Description.Text: Cedar Crest College - Graduation May 14, 2011 De Sales University - Graduation May 21, 2011 Lafayette College - Graduation May 21, 2011 Lehigh University - Graduation May 23, 2011, Moravian College - Graduation May 14, 2011 Muhlenberg College - Graduation May 22, 2011

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: The Courtyard Bethlehem is conveniently located at the intersection of I-78 and Route 33, just a mile south of Route 22. It is just a short drive to both downtown Easton and downtown Bethlehem, and only 20 minutes east of the Lehigh Valley Airport.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: A full hot breakfast buffet is available to greet you each morning of your stay. A chef will make eggs cooked to order including omelets any way you wish. Bacon, sausage, French toast, as well as fresh fruit and pastries are available.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: The Courtyard is your meeting and group destination with meeting space available to accommodate up to 40 guests. Plan your next event in one of our 2 meeting spaces, our corporate boardroom or larger Navigator room. Catering and beverage service avail.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: This sparkling Courtyard promises gracious service, amazing sleep experiences and a unique hot breakfast. The lobby becomes your family room with a full-service bar, fireplace, numerous televisions, and plenty of room to gather. Conveniently located at I-78 and Route 33. Fitness center available 24 hours a day. The Bright Ides Boardroom is perfect for hosting interviews or as a break-out room for our larger Navigator room. The Navigator meeting room is the ideal size for training groups and meetings.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: Competitive strengths= location – easily accessible (from interstate 78 & Route 22) – Guest Service currently in top 10% of Courtyards, Breakfast – tends to be very attractive to corporate guests & groups especially college teams (still offering the full hot breakfast buffet – not yet converted to Bistro) can be negotiated into rates; Complimentary airport shuttle btwn 7am & 11pm; walking distance to restaurants, ½ mile from shopping center. Large Meeting Space, Executive Boardroom, Large conversation area.
